entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Grand Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:53 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Ice pellets mixed with snow changing to freezing rain mixed with ice pellets this afternoon. Ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Ice pellets mixed with snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets changing to ice pellets mixed with snow late this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Cloudy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 7.
